messages.title: WE HAVE A CLEAR CHOICE
messages.content: The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.

messages.title: THE LIB DEMS ARE WINNING
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections in May.
A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.

issues.brexitEurope: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.
issues.economy: The Liberals commit to rebuild our economy.

contactInformation.address: Callco House, 49 Theobald Street, Borehamwood WD6 4RT

images.caption: Jo Swinson, Leader of the Liberal Democrats

leaflet.additionalNotes: Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader. MPs from Labour and the Conservatives are joining the Lib Dems, fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent.
